subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong’s new cycling team, Radio Shack, will make its debut at the 2010 Tour Down Under in Australia from Jan. 17-24. Armstrong, who finished third in the Tour de France in July while racing for Astana, made the announcement on his Twitter page.
